abstract: The maker of Post-it Notes, helped by an increase in auto and aerospace orders, had a net income gain of 2.8 percent in the fourth quarter.
snippet: The maker of Post-it Notes, helped by an increase in auto and aerospace orders, had a net income gain of 2.8 percent in the fourth quarter.
lead_paragraph: The 3M Company, the maker of Post-it Notes and industrial products, reported higher fourth-quarter profit than analysts had estimated as demand increased for aerospace and auto products.
